constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 213 (Thursday, December 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FOSTER:
H.R. 6222.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H7637]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Protecting Immigrants From Legal Exploitation Act of 2021
